summary: This document contains financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts at Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. It includes details about account balances, transactions, and portfolio summaries, highlighting significant financial activities and asset management strategies. The document is marked as confidential and is part of the evidence in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
